dashboard.label: Dashboard Dark Mode
dashboard.description: Dark theme support with dashboards for optimized display on NOC, SOC, and overhead monitor walls.

html.p: Splunk is already a critical element within security and network operation centers - support for dark theme within dashboards out-of-the-box further optimizes Splunk presence on the NOC/SOC wall.

ul.li: Edit Mode Theme Setting - Set the default view theme for a given dashboard from a UI confuguration within edit mode
Advanced URL Param - For advanced usage in view mode, pass the url param "?theme=dark" to set the theme. (note that not all dashboards may support this)
Custom Visualization Support - Several custom visualizations have been updated to support the new theming feature.

html.p: To activate Dark Mode, simply navigate to any custom dashboard and click "Edit". From there, toggle "Dark Theme" and refresh the page.
